TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapReflectionImporter extends System.Object

summary.span: 生成从 .NET Framework 类型或 Web 服务方法信息到 SOAP 编码消息的映射。

span.span: Generates mappings to SOAP-encoded messages from .NET Framework types or Web service method information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了类型映射到 SOAP 编码的消息部分，如 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档中定义。The class provides type mappings to SOAP-encoded message parts, as defined in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. Web 服务时才使用或客户端指定 SOAP 编码的 SOAP 1.1 规范第 5 节中所述。It is used only when a Web service or client specifies SOAP encoding, as described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 序列化`GroupName`并`IgnoreThis`字段和的成员`GroupType`枚举将被重写。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 在中`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法，已创建，并为每个重写的成员或枚举、 一个设置，并添加到相应的属性创建。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 使用创建，并且用于创建的重写默认序列化。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. [!code-cpp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CPP/soapover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CS/soapover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/VB/SoapOver.vb#1)]

related.span: 用来控制编码的 SOAP 序列化的属性

param.name: elementName
param.span: 从 Web 服务方法生成的 XML 元素名称。

span.span: An XML element name produced from the Web service method.

param.name: ns
param.span: 从 Web 服务方法生成的 XML 元素命名空间。

span.span: An XML element namespace produced from the Web service method.

param.name: members
param.span: 属于 Web 服务方法的 .NET Framework 代码实体的数组。

span.span: An array of .NET Framework code entities that belong to a Web service method.

summary.span: 为从 Web 服务方法收集的信息生成内部类型映射。

span.span: Generates internal type mappings for information that is gathered from a Web service method.

returns.span: 到 WSDL 消息定义中元素部分的内部 .NET Framework 类型映射。

span.span: Internal .NET Framework type mappings to the element parts of a WSDL message definition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法时 Web 服务或客户端，在初始化或专用于反映将 Web 服务调用。The method is called while initializing a Web service or client, or reflecting a Web service. 不需要直接调用。You do not need to call it directly. 下面列出的可能值为`members`参数：The following list describes possible values for the `members` parameter: - Web 服务方法输入的参数。Web service method input parameters. - Web 服务方法输出参数，以及返回类型，如果不能为 void，在索引为零。Web service method output parameters, plus the return type, if not void, at index zero. - 输入的 SOAP 标头。SOAP input headers. - SOAP 输出标头。SOAP output headers.
